tweet_text: As a vaccine checker at a venue, someone asked me "Vaccine for what?" which was a ridiculous question.
The nurse let me use my own bandaid for my vaccine, but now she regrets it.

People eagerly got the polio vaccine in 1955 while there were no artificial satellites yet. Today, we carry powerful devices and have robots on Mars, but some people are skeptical of the COVID vaccine.
My mom's only side effect from her second vaccine shot was an appreciation for science.
A young ballet student asked me if I was excited to get the "Fauci Ouchie" vaccine, and now I love calling it that because it's adorable.
Lindsey Graham received a vaccine before I did, even though I'm a nurse.
Johnson & Johnson designed their vaccine using their knowledge from making 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner.
My 10-year-old got the Pfizer vaccine and was scared, but he kept whispering his high-risk friend's name. I have no regrets because he did it out of love for his friend.
Dolly Parton helped fund the COVID vaccine, so please don't refuse to take it.
The pharmacy doesn't have anything to treat my horse's worms, only COVID vaccines.
My aunt, a vaccinated lawyer who was an advocate for domestic violence survivors, passed away from Covid suddenly last night. Rest in peace to this amazing soul. ❤️
I talked with Bill Gates about India's fight against Coronavirus, the Gates Foundation's work on COVID-19, technology's role, and creating a vaccine for the pandemic.
Someone has obtained a Pfizer vaccine agreement and is sharing details about it on social media under the hashtag #PfizerLeak.

The mRNA vaccines (Pfizer and Moderna) work by tricking the body into thinking it has been infected with COVID-19, which triggers an immune response that helps protect against the virus. It's a really clever and innovative approach to vaccinations.
The idea that coronavirus will go away in summer months is a myth. Previous pandemics did not follow weather patterns and the virus is global, meaning it will not disappear based on seasonal changes.
BTS gave a meaningful speech at #UNGA about climate action, COVID-19 vaccines, and self-care. They inspired many young people to join in creating a better world. #BTSLoveMyself
The FDA has approved the first COVID-19 vaccine for people 16 years and older.
A vaccine card from 1956 was found at a thrift store and feels relevant to the current situation.

The writer has just left the ER and reports that COVID-19 is causing a surge in cases again. The Delta Variant is spreading more easily than the original virus. Almost all of the people admitted to the ICU hadn't been vaccinated, and now they regret it.
I got vaccinated for COVID-19 and my wing is sore, but it will keep me and others healthy. Erica Hill said I've been getting vaccines since I was young.

Oxford University wanted to share their vaccine recipe for free, but the Gates Foundation convinced them to sell it to AstraZeneca. AstraZeneca is now having trouble providing the vaccine, and it's hard for poor countries to get it.
A 66-year-old immigrant researcher worked on mRNA for decades despite lack of funding or a lab. Her work became the basis for Pfizer and Moderna vaccines.
Jin from BTS said they are vaccinated and understand people's fear of vaccines because it's new, but we can't be afraid of progress. President Moon smiled at their statement.
People accepted KFC's secret recipe with 11 herbs and spices for years, yet now they question the ingredients in the Covid vaccine.
They first claimed that the vaccine prevented the transmission of the virus, but now they are denying that statement. There is video evidence to support this.
A doctor in Alabama says that some of her Covid patients, who are dying, ask for the vaccine before being intubated but she has to tell them it's too late.
The USA, UK, and European Union have stopped Global South countries from making and importing affordable versions of the covid vaccines.

The CDC says most people who died from coronavirus had other health problems. Only a small number of people died from coronavirus alone. Some people think the pandemic was made up by Democrats to affect the election.

India's record-breaking vaccination numbers are great news. The vaccine is still the best way to fight COVID-19. Congratulations to those who got vaccinated and thanks to all the front-line workers who made it happen. Good job India!

These vaccines didn't just appear out of nowhere. They were developed through decades of research in multiple fields, using our extensive knowledge. This is how science works and it's amazing. The idea that they came out of nowhere is due to poor communication about science.
The WHO has approved the first malaria vaccine after 100 years of searching, which could save many children in sub-Saharan Africa. It is a historic event.
The writer is blaming Gov. Abbott for the deaths of thousands of Texans due to his mishandling of the pandemic and energy crisis, putting profits over people's lives.
Many things we use today are unnatural, like vaccines, but also eye glasses, airplanes, and many other inventions.
A whistleblower involved in Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine trial has raised concerns about the accuracy of data and oversight from regulatory authorities.

It's a matter of pride for India that the two approved vaccines are made in the country. This demonstrates the dedication of our scientists towards a self-reliant India, driven by kindness and concern.
An mRNA vaccine sends a message to your immune system that teaches it how to fight the virus, but it doesn't have the virus in it. It disappears like a Snapchat message after it's done its job.
Chloe Mrozak used a fake COVID-19 vaccine card to enter Hawaii and avoid travel restrictions. The card said "Maderna" instead of "Moderna". She has been arrested.

A judge has ruled that the FDA must produce the Pfizer Covid vaccine data at a much faster rate than initially requested. Instead of 500 pages per month, they must now produce 55,000 pages per month. The Judge's decision can be found at the given link.

A study shows that after three months, the Pfizer and Moderna vaccines' effectiveness against the Omicron variant is negative. People who received these vaccines are more likely to be infected than unvaccinated people.
9 months ago, I collapsed at home after my first AstraZeneca vaccine. I lost my left leg and have other health problems because of it, even though I was previously healthy and fit.

The booster shot was not meant to reduce symptoms, but to maintain the belief that the vaccine could prevent people from getting and spreading COVID. This belief was the foundation for vaccine mandates, but it fell apart this month.
I got my COVID-19 vaccine today and feel grateful to live in a place where I can access it. However, it's important to acknowledge that vaccine distribution is unequal worldwide.
The Covid Passport is not just about checking if people are vaccinated. It could create a national caste system and a spying apparatus. People should be aware and fight against it.
New study shows vaccines and natural immunity work against COVID variants, good news for everyone except bureaucrats and tyrants.
The Blackfeet Nation gave 750 extra COVID-19 vaccines to people in Alberta, Canada. People drove a long way to get vaccinated at a clinic set up at the border.
Someone is angry at journalists who criticized natural immunity and shared a link to an article by a Harvard epidemiologist who argues against COVID vaccine passports.
The first shipment of coronavirus vaccine has left Pfizer's facility near Kalamazoo, Michigan, on UPS and FedEx trucks.

Dr. Malone has the right to express his opinion on Covid vaccines, but he was suspended despite being a well-respected scientist and inventor of mRNA vaccine technology. This is a disgraceful situation.
Call them immunization records instead of vaccine passports because we've always had to show them for jobs and school.
The FDA and CDC recommend stopping the use of Johnson & Johnson's COVID-19 vaccine due to concerns.
Orlando Magic player Jonathan Isaac won't get vaccinated because he thinks he's already immune, and the data shows he's not at risk from COVID.
Stephen A. Smith got Covid, was really sick, and almost died. He thinks that the vaccine he got saved him, because he didn't die. This is a really dumb idea.
Some Seattle firefighters and police officers who were fired for not getting vaccinated are now feeding the homeless.
A study of 52,238 Cleveland Clinic employees found that people who had COVID-19 and did not get vaccinated had the same risk of re-infection as those who had COVID-19 and got vaccinated.
Jimin from BTS donated KRW100 million to Rotary, which will help provide more polio vaccines for children. This generous contribution will work with WHO and partners to end polio.

The economy has improved, jobs have been added, and vaccines have been distributed, but many people still don't think the country is on the right track. The Democratic Party needs to communicate their message better.

I talked to @POTUS about why it's important for young people to get vaccinated. Visit https://t.co/r4TnB8gx3b to learn more and find a vaccination center near you. It's free, easy, and crucial! #vaccineswork

The Biden administration admitted that 20 million Covid-19 vaccine doses are missing. Earlier, I suspected something was strange about the vaccine supply and suggested investigating Jared. I still stand by my statement.
Norway has returned to normal without mask, vaccine or social distancing mandates, thanks to following the science.
Don't listen to Joe Rogan, he's not a scientist. Reminder to get vaccinated from the Jonas Brothers and Big Bird.

Stanley Johnson represents the hypocrisy, cronyism, and elitism of the Tory government by getting his 2nd vaccine before many vulnerable people have received their 1st, despite breaking the lockdown repeatedly.
A Utah teacher was fired for calling Trump a "moron" and urging her conservative students to get vaccinated and stop watching FOX News. Some are calling for her to be rehired.

The vaccines were made for the original COVID-19 virus, but a new and stronger strain (delta) came around by the time people started getting vaccinated. This is why some vaccinated people are still getting COVID-19.
The vaccine helps you get less sick, reduces hospitalizations, and lowers the chance of death. Spread the word!

A Republican lawmaker from Wisconsin who sponsored bills against mask and vaccine mandates is now on a ventilator fighting for his life after catching COVID-19. He had gone without a mask during a committee meeting. If you're vaccinated, please retweet.

Joe Biden did not mention naturally acquired immunity, which is shown to be more durable than the vaccine and an estimated 100 million Americans have it. This is dishonest and shows that they do not care.

A new variant of COVID-19 called C.1.2 has been found in South Africa and other countries. It may spread more easily and could potentially avoid vaccines. This variant mutates faster than previous variants.

Kevin Durant tested positive for covid and many Brooklyn Nets players may become ineligible to play due to vaccine requirements. Kyrie Irving is currently the only eligible player, but he previously refused to get vaccinated and was criticized for it.

My mother had a severe reaction to Covid-19 and the vaccine, and as a result, she had to have both her legs amputated below the knee. She will also lose most of her hands later. We need assistance in paying for her medical expenses and making her more comfortable. We are grateful for her survival and appreciate any help.
American and Southwest Airlines will enforce vaccine mandates despite Governor Abbott's ban, in alignment with Biden's orders. Show support if you agree.

The US Supreme Court repeated COVID misinformation today, including claims that 100,000 children are in critical care and on ventilators, a vaccine mandate would prevent all US cases, and COVID deaths are at an all-time high.

The number of Covid deaths in the last two years is greater than the number of AIDS deaths from 1981 to 2000. We have a vaccine to prevent Covid. In the future, people will be shocked that a country could be so ignorant and tolerate so much death.

The University of Connecticut will punish students who do not get vaccinated by taking away internet access and fining them. The person posting the tweet believes that there is something wrong with the vaccines and they will never get vaccinated.

The pandemic won't end just because a new year starts. We need to wear masks, get vaccinated, and avoid large gatherings to slow it down and eventually stop it. Our actions, not the calendar, will make a difference.

Scientists at Walter Reed Army Institute of Research have made a vaccine called SpFN that can protect people from COVID-19 and all its variants including Omicron. It uses Spike Ferritin Nanoparticles.

A judge ruled in favor of a Kentucky hospital system's COVID vaccine mandate and denied a request to end the mandate by anti-vaccine hospital employees. The employees who refuse to get vaccinated will be fired.
Take whichever vaccine you're offered without being picky.

People in Italy are sharing a diagram claiming it's the 5G chip in the COVID vaccine, but it's actually an electric circuit for a guitar pedal. The author thinks it's a good idea to put it in the vaccine.
People are bringing their own food and having picnics on the street in Calgary because restaurants and bars require vaccine passports to sit on patios.
Scientists have conducted successful trials of a potential vaccine against Alzheimer's disease in mice, which reversed their memory loss. They hope to move onto human trials quickly.
Vaccines eradicated polio and smallpox, not herd immunity.

My daughter, who is immuno-suppressed due to cancer and transplant, didn't develop antibodies for the vaccines she received. We are disappointed but still hopeful. This is why it's important to get vaccinated and wear masks during the pandemic, especially for those who are vulnerable.
The University of California has suspended a physician and Director of the Medical Ethics Program, who had challenged their vaccine mandate in court. Details are provided in a post.
My brother and his wife died from COVID despite being anti-vaccine. Please vaccinate and wear a mask.
In Texas, over 50,000 students have tested positive for coronavirus in a few weeks. Some schools have temporarily closed because of the disease. Texas has also had 59 child deaths from COVID-19.

The leaders of France, Canada, and the United States - Macron, Trudeau, and Biden - are working together to use fear to make people get vaccinated and use vaccine passports. They are evil and trying to be totalitarian. People are starting to realize this and standing up against it. #liberte
North Carolina police chief punished for telling officers to get fake vaccine cards at a "self-vaccination" clinic. Should he be fired?
There is no FDA-approved COVID-19 vaccine available in the US right now and Pfizer has no plans to make one available soon, despite what the fact checkers, Big Pharma, and the government claim.
The Moderna vaccine was created in partnership with President Trump on January 13, 2020. This news is good for America and the world.
Piers Corbyn, an anti-vaxxer, was tricked into thinking he was given £10,000 by AstraZeneca to stop criticizing their vaccine. However, the money was fake and the incident was recorded.
The Biden government is forcing Marines to take the COVID-19 vaccine or else they will lose their pensions, tuition assistance, and access to the G.I. bill. This is a form of medical tyranny.
I got vaccinated and have no side effects, so now I can hang out with my friends.

AT&T now requires its workers to get vaccinated and plans to terminate those who do not comply. They aim to protect their staff and customers. Do you agree with this decision? Please retweet if you do.

A possible vaccine for multiple sclerosis is being developed by BioNTech, the same company that developed the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine. Test results in mice are looking very promising for improving symptoms and stopping MS from getting worse.
United Airlines is firing 600 workers who didn't get vaccinated. They won't keep their jobs unless they get the shot. If you support United keeping flights safe, share this.
People in São Paulo are protesting for vaccines, food, and the impeachment of Brazil's president Jair Bolsonaro. They are marching on Paulista Avenue.

A BBC presenter named Lisa Shaw died due to complications from the AstraZeneca Covid vaccine. The coroner found that she developed blood clots in the brain which led to her death after developing headaches a week after her first dose. She was a healthy mother of one.
The government lied to governors and the public about a strategic reserve of vaccines that doesn't actually exist. The Trump administration needs to take responsibility for this deception.
Despite 75% of Americans being vaccinated, COVID cases have still increased 300% compared to this time last year.

Biden's presidency has had gas and border crises, schools closed, rising inflation, attacks on Israel, increased crime, and he's taking credit for Trump's vaccine efforts. He also plans to raise taxes.
I met a man from Israel who showed me his vaccine passport on his phone. He mentioned Americans' tendency to politicize everything and we both didn't understand it.
A group called America's Frontline Doctors filed a lawsuit to stop children from getting the COVID-19 vaccine to protect their rights to their bodies.

Polio killed 3,145 Americans in 1952. After a vaccine was available in 1955, all states required children to be vaccinated to attend public schools. COVID has killed 345,000 Americans in 2020 and 416,000 more in 2021.
The FDA has officially declared that the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine is safe and effective. Please get vaccinated to end the pandemic.
My friend at @8VC lost his uncle to COVID-19 in India. They need more vaccines. I will donate $50 for every retweet, up to $125,000 USD, in honor of his family to help with efforts in India.
The COVID vaccines cannot completely prevent you from getting COVID, but they can make your symptoms less severe and reduce your chances of dying from it.
Some people in Greece are paying doctors to give them fake COVID-19 shots, but the doctors are actually giving them the real vaccine and keeping the money.
Disney and other Florida businesses have stopped their COVID-19 vaccine requirements and are hiring back employees who were fired for refusing to get vaccinated.

The tweet accuses Bill Gates of being involved in the coronavirus pandemic, including the Wuhan lab, predictions from the World Economic Forum, vaccines, tests, and censorship. The tweet also suggests that Gates is purchasing a lot of land while people suffer from lockdowns, and calls for him to be arrested for crimes against humanity.
Most adults are vaccinated but many COVID patients in hospitals are unvaccinated and regret delaying. Some young adults are very sick. Don't wait to get vaccinated.

A Texas judge approves Southwest Airlines' pilot vaccine mandate, stating that it makes air travel safer and improves pilot working conditions. Governor Abbott loses the case. Retweet if you support the judge's decision.

Vote no on the Republican recall in California and support @GavinNewsom by returning your ballot by 9/14 at 8PM. The ballot includes important issues such as vaccines, climate change, immigrant rights, minimum wage, reproductive rights, gun safety and more. #VoteNoOnRecall.
Jurgen Klopp likened being unvaccinated to drink driving.
All three vaccines (Pfizer, Moderna, Oxford) are effective, protective, and safe.
A firefighter in California put poop on his vaccine non-compliance letter and has been put on leave. Do you think he should be fired?
President Biden criticized Fox News and other right-wing networks for spreading anti-vaccine "misinformation" and making money by "peddling lies." He also said they are harming their own audience.

The CDC says only about 28% of Black people have gotten the Covid vaccine. If some states require proof of vaccination to go to restaurants and other places, it could disproportionately hurt the Black community.
People over 40 can get their COVID booster shot 3 months after their second dose and should book appointments with the NHS. The government officials are not present to announce this news.

Hospitals are letting vaccinated employees with Covid work as long as they wear a mask and have no fever, but many healthcare workers were fired or quit due to vaccine mandates, which may have prevented sick employees from working.
The Supreme Court said no to Biden's vaccine mandate with a 6-3 vote, which is a big victory for state power and following the rules of the Constitution in the United States.
Yes, the police union was lying and using fear tactics.
Republican politicians oppose vaccine mandates and ignore mask regulations, but still blame Biden for the ongoing spread of Covid.

People who are against vaccines are only focusing on low death rates in young people with COVID-19, but they are not paying attention to the increasing number of hospitalizations and neurological complications that are arising from the virus. Brain injury is emerging as a complication of COVID-19 and long COVID.
Biden's vaccine mandate is wrong and goes against privacy rights. The government cannot make employers require vaccinations.

China has a new QR code system for vaccine passports that tracks personal information like name, photo, age, family members, address, employer, vaccination status, COVID testing history, and travel history in real time. This digital passport is considered more dangerous than a paper one.

Supreme Court Justices are mistakenly claiming that the coronavirus vaccine can prevent disease and transmission in the workplace, which is untrue and concerning as they use this information to make decisions.
Getting a COVID shot is a personal decision and shouldn't affect your job. The vaccine mandate by Biden is unconstitutional and we need to fight it. Vaccine mandates are not good for the economy.

An interview with someone who supports the COVID-19 vaccine is causing surprise among people who are against vaccination. The person said that the vaccine is a great achievement and those who don't get vaccinated are the ones who get very sick and end up in the hospital.

I got the Moderna vaccine and now have a blood clot in my lungs which has affected my speaking, walking, and breathing. I want to raise awareness so others, especially males 18-24, can double-check before taking the vaccine. Please retweet. ❤️
Protestors in Verona, Italy are chanting that they will continue to fight against the COVID vaccine mandate.
I'm 65 and I got my first COVID-19 vaccine dose. I feel good and want to thank all those who made it possible.
New York City requires all police officers and workers to get vaccinated. If they refuse, they will not get paid and be put on leave. Do you support this?
Joe Rogan said on his popular show that vaccines cause COVID-19 mutations and scientists aren't talking about it because they're scared of backlash. People are worried about what may happen next.
The vaccine stops you from getting very sick or dying. Why is that difficult to understand?

A healthy 86-year-old woman was given the COVID-19 vaccine by her doctor and 8 weeks later developed a cancerous tumor on her cheek. She had no prior health conditions and followed a healthy diet and exercise routine.
75 lawmakers traded stocks in companies that make COVID-19 products during the pandemic, and it should be illegal.
At least 75 lawmakers bought and sold stock in companies making COVID-19 vaccines and treatments during the pandemic, according to Business Insider.

Texas Republicans believe masks and vaccines infringe on their bodily autonomy, but they are allowing people to sue Uber drivers for taking women who are victims of rape to get abortions, which is concerning. Even those who are Pro-Life should be alarmed by this. It feels like we're in Gilead.
Military personnel who refuse the COVID-19 vaccine are being discharged, while unvaccinated illegal immigrants are entering the country without consequence and Democrats are silent.
Fox News hosts who are vaccinated are hypocritical for bashing the vaccine and opposing mandates, while Fox News has its own mandates. This is damaging to America.
Twelve states are planning to take legal action against the Biden administration's vaccine mandate.

Businesses will be fined $14K per employee for not following Biden's vaccine mandate, while illegal immigrants receive a $450K payout for illegally crossing the border. This is the situation in Biden's America.
The vaccine passport is like a digital ID that could lead to the government controlling everything you do.
Pope Francis is encouraging people to get vaccinated against COVID-19, calling it an act of love.

Anti-vaxxer leader Marcus Lamb, who founded Daystar Television Network, has died from COVID-19 despite not being vaccinated. He and his network spent two years criticizing vaccines and scientists, calling them the work of the devil. Share if you're vaccinated.
Justice Sotomayor's claim that there are over 100,000 children in serious condition due to COVID-19 is false.
Tory MPs who voted for laws restricting protests and citizenship removal without notice now claim they are against vaccine passports for reasons of freedom and civil liberties.
The 5th Circuit has temporarily stopped OSHA's vaccine mandate because there are concerns about legal issues with the mandate.
Where did the $150 million for buying vaccines go, as the world pushes towards vaccination?
